ResumeParserData.Experience: NatWest Group  Senior Business Analyst  Manchester, UK  2020 - Present  Lead business analysis activities for large-scale projects.  Conduct comprehensive data analysis to support strategic decision-making.  Develop and document detailed business requirements and process maps.  Facilitate workshops and meetings with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide project updates.  Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and internal policies.  Key Achievements :   Successfully led the implementation of a new risk management system, improving risk assessment accuracy by 20%.  Developed a set of process maps that streamlined operations and reduced processing time by 15%.  Santander UK  Business Analyst  Manchester, UK  2016 - 2020  Conducted data analysis to identify business improvement opportunities.  Gathered and documented business requirements for new projects.  Developed business cases and project proposals to support decision-making.  Provided training and support to users on new systems and processes.  Key Achievements :   Led a project to automate reporting processes, reducing manual effort by 25%.  Identified key performance indicators that helped improve operational efficiency.

Lead business analysis activities for large-scale projects. 
 Conduct comprehensive data analysis to support strategic decision-making. 
 Develop and document detailed business requirements and process maps. 
 Facilitate workshops and meetings with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide project updates. 
 Ensure compliance with regulatory standards and internal policies. 
 Key Achievements :

 Developed a set of process maps that streamlined operations and reduced processing time by 15%.
